description:
Season 4 of Activision's Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone has officially launched. Alongside the new season's start, a series of leaks revealed various items coming to the game, such as the iconic Beam Saber from the Gundam universe, new skins, and more.

Thanks to the official Charlie INTEL X/Twitter account, we now know how many of these cosmetics and weapons will look in action. The Beam Saber is arguably the most eye-catching of them all. Not only does the aesthetic of the weapon stay true to the anime, but it could also easily double as a purple lightsaber.

Beam saber melee we
title: Call Of Duty Leak Shows Off The Gundam Beam Saber In Action, New Weapons, And More

description: The 2010s were a great time to be a Dragon Ball fan, as the franchise made a huge return to TV with Dragon Ball Super. Set a few years after the Majin Buu saga, Dragon Ball Super saw Goku, Vegeta, the rest of Earth's mightiest warriors, and Krillin face new threats across the entire universe. If you've been looking to rewatch this entire saga, preorders are now live for Dragon Ball Super: The Complete Collection on Blu-ray ahead of its July 31 release.
title: Dragon Ball Super Blu-Ray Box Set Comes With 10 Steelbook Cases

description:
Joy-Con are among the most expensive first-party controllers on the market, carrying a regular retail price of $80 for a pair. They also rarely see discounts, as Nintendo is well-known for keeping items at list price throughout most of the year. However, right now is one of the rare times you'll find Joy-Con at a discount, with a variety of styles currently seeing a price cut at Amazon and Walmart.

Get Joy-Con deal at Amazon

One of the most enticing deals is for the Pastel Pink and Pastel Yellow Joy-Con, as they're down to just $66. They're also sold and shipped by Amazon, with Prime members eligible for one-day shipping in select locations. These are your standard Nintendo Switch Joy-Con, offering HD rumble, two black wrist straps, and support for both the origin
title: Nintendo Switch Joy-Con Controllers Get Rare Discounts At Amazon And Walmart

description:
After spending over a decade in development hell, the Just Cause movie is finally taking some major steps forward. Blue Beetle director Angel Manuel Soto has signed on to helm the adaptation of Square Enix and Avalanche Studios' hit video game franchise.

Via The Hollywood Reporter, the Just Cause movie has also picked up a new studio. Universal Pictures will now produce the film, after the rights lapsed from Constantin Film. The first Just Cause game was released in 2006, and the first stories about a film adaptation followed three years later. In 2019, John Wick creator Derek Kolstad joined the project as a screenwriter before ultimately parting from the
title: Just Cause Movie Lands Blue Beetle Director And New Studio

description:
Viggo Mortensen, best known for his role as Aragorn in the Lord of the Rings trilogy, has recently stated that he's open to reprising his role as one of the fellowship members once again if it's "right for the character."

In an interview with GQ, Mortensen was asked if he'd be open to playing Aragorn once again in The Hunt for Gollum, to which he responded by saying:

"Sure. I don't know exactly what the story is, I haven't heard. Maybe I'll hear about it eventually. I like playing that character. I learned a lot playing the character. I enjoyed it a lot. I would only do it if I was right for it in terms of, you know, the age I am now and so forth. I would only do it if I was right for the character. It would be silly to do it otherwise."
title: Viggo Mortensen Would Reprise His LOTR Role But Only If It's "Right For The Character"

description:
Pokemon Go's new Shared Skies season officially begins on June 1, and the game is kicking things off in a big way. Developer Niantic is hosting a variety of events and bonuses in Pokemon Go next month, including new Spotlight Hours, two Community Days, and weekly raids that bring back some beloved legendary and Mega Pokemon.

Here's the full list of events happening in Pokemon Go in June 2024.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Raid Schedule

Raid Schedule

A handful of legendary and Mega Pokemon are returning to raids in June. Tying in to the new season's sky theme, many airborne legendaries like Zapdos, Incarnate Forme Landorus, and Yveltal will be appearing in five-star raids, while Mega Gyar
title: Pokemon Go June 2024 Events: Raids, Spotlight Hours, Community Days, And More

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 will apparently release across multiple console generations. With the Season 4 launch today for Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone, dataminers dug into the files and found references to a Black Ops 6 cross-gen bundle.

If the bundle is real, its name would suggest Activision will offer a bundle that includes copies of the game for multiple console generations, just like the company did with Modern Warfare 3 before it.

Black Ops 6 now officially confirmed for last-gen
Logo for Black Ops 6 Cross-Gen Bundle found in files pic.twitter.com/WFNB1O0MGa

— CharlieIntel (@charlieINTEL)
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Will Be On PS4 And Xbox One, Leak Reveals

description:
Season 4 adds four new killstreaks to Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3's multiplayer, but each new streak will need to be unlocked. Here we'll explain how these new streaks work and how to gain access to them.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Intelligent Munitions Systems (I.M.S.)

Intelligent Munitions Systems (I.M.S.)

Killstreak cost: 7 kills or 875 score.
title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - All Season 4 Killstreaks And How To Unlock Them
Baseball Fans Should Check Out This Limited-Time MLB The Show 24 Deal

description:
Season 4 of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 is live, adding a new battle pass, more maps, weapons, and modes. The update also includes two new multiplayer perks, but first you'll need to unlock them. Here we'll explain how these new perks work and how to access them.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Mission Control Vest

Mission Control Vest

This new vest perk works similarly to the Hardline perk from previous Call of Duty games, which lets you earn killstreaks with fewer kills.

This streak specialist vest provid
title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - All Season 4 Perks And How To Unlock Them

description:
Pricy bundles and expensive DLC are not uncommon among gaming companies. But Riot Games may have taken things to a new level with its latest League of Legends bundles. As a tribute to esports icon and League of Legends player Lee ‘Faker’ Sang-hyeok, Riot is offering three bundle tiers, with the highest one set to cost approximately $450.

As announced on Riot's official site, Faker has been inducted into the company's hall of fame, the Hall of Legends, for being the most-successful player in the history of League of Legends, and for his contributions to esports. Faker and Riot also collaborated on the new bundles to celebrate his induction. The first bundle, the Risen Legend Collection, includes a Hall of Legends Pass, a Takedown Counter Taunt, an icon, an emote, a banner, and Ahri with a unique orange-and-white skin for for 430 RP or $40. The second tier, the Immortalized Legend Collection, includes everything
title: League Of Legends Gets $450 Bundle, Fans React With Shock

description:
Season 4 of Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone is live, adding a new battle pass, more maps, weapons, and modes. Data miners are already digging through the new game files to search for upcoming events and secrets, and an image from Call of Duty's rumored Fallout collaboration has been leaked.

Data miners have revealed an image with Soap, Ghost, Captain Price, and Gaz of MW3's Task Force 141 all wearing the iconic blue vault dweller suits from Fallout. The secret crossover with Fallout was o
title: Leaked Call Of Duty Crossover With Fallout Reveals Vault Dweller Skins

description:
You can finally change your name in Disney Dreamlight Valley. DDV is an ever-growing game filled with plenty of magic and whimsy. As the game gets larger and things change--especially with the addition of multiplayer--you may find yourself growing and changing along with it. You can customize your character in plenty of unique ways, but what if you decide you don't like the name you initially chose for your avatar? Lucky for you, you're able to change it, and we'll tell you precisely how to do so below.

How to change your name in Disney Dreamlight Valley

Changing your name in Disney Dreamlight Valley is a straightforward process, but the setting isn't where you might expect. Rather than finding it in the avatar customization menu, you'll actually need to go to your main game settings to fi
title: How To Change Your Name In Disney Dreamlight Valley

description:
YouTube has announced the introduction of over 75 games to its platform, all of which can be played in-browser or via the YouTube mobile app. Over the past few months, the game library--referred to by YouTube as "Playables"--has been made available to select users in certain markets, but the company announced this week Playables is being expanded.

Playables can be accessed via a user's browser or iOS device (no word yet on Android compatibility), and the current selection consists of simple-yet-engaging games similar to those found on Google Play and the App Store. From classics like chess and billiards to modern titles like Angry Birds Showdown and Tomb Of The Mask, YouTube's Playables collection has games spanning multiple genres.

Unfortunately, even after the official announcement regarding their introduction, not everyone can access the games yet, but YouTube has assured users that the new feature will be accessible for all in the near future.
title: YouTube Introduces New "Playables" Game Library

description:
For the better part of a decade, Gaten Matarazzo has portrayed Dustin Henderson on Netflix's Stranger Things. He's grown up in front of our collective eyes ahead of the upcoming fifth and final season. Matarazzo has met a lot of fans since the first season premiered in 2016. But there was one particularly creepy fan encounter that left him shocked.

Via US Magazine, Matarazzo recently appeared on Michael Rosenbaum's Inside of You podcast where he related his bizarre and deeply uncomfortable meeting with a much older woman.

"I did one very recently--and this is not very funny, but the reactions around it were quite funny--where this woman in her 40s said straight up, 'I've had a crush on you since you were 13,'" said Matarazzo. "And I was like, 'That’s upsetting.’' I'm sure she just meant, 'Aw, this kid's cute.' But then she doubled down."

<
title: Stranger Things' Gaten Matarazzo Shares His Creepiest Fan Interaction

description:
Season 4 of Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone arrives today, and the latest patch notes detail all the big changes for this new season of Call of Duty. Season 4 includes perks changes, a higher player count in standard battle royale, and plenty of weapon balancing.

The new season launches with two new weapons in the battle pass, more operators, two multiplayer maps, new game modes, as well as more perks and killstreaks. More details on Season 4 content can be found here.

The patch notes include weapon balancing for Modern Warfare 3's multiplayer, including a huge nerf for the popular BP50 a
title: CoD: Warzone And MW3 Season 4 Patch Notes Detail Perk Changes And Bigger BR Matches

description:
Tom Bombadil was one of the major omissions from previous adaptations of J. R. R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, as he was left out of Peter Jackson's live-action trilogy and Ralph Bakshi's animated LOTR from 1978. Even Tolkien himself seemed to have trouble placing the enigmatic character in his own story, as he was powerful and also immune to the temptation of the One Ring. Now, Tom Bombadil is finally set to make his cinematic debut in The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Season 2.

Via Vanity Fair, Rory Kinnear will play Tom Bombadil in The Rings of Power. Kinnear's previous roles include Bill Tanner in the last four James Bond movies as well as the Creature in Showtime's Penny Dreadful.

Rory Kinnear is Tom Bombadil in the second season of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power. Learn more on
title: Rings Of Power Season 2 Introducing LOTR Fan-Favorite Character Tom Bombadil

description:
For one day only (May 29), Star Wars fans can score a pretty great deal on replica lightsaber sets and hilts, as the Disney Store is offering a 30% discount on them. Elegant weapons from a more civilized age, these replicas feature a high degree of detail, are screen-accurate versions of the original, and they come with amazing display cases so that you can properly show them.

See all deals at Disney

Even better, each lightsaber set comes with a detachable blade, so when you're not cosplaying as your favorite Jedi or Sith lord, they can be easily disassembled
title: Disney's Star Wars Lightsaber Sets Are 30% Off Today Only While Supplies Last (May 29)

description:
Sony has confirmed a new PlayStation State of Play Showcase is coming this week on May 30, and will reveal more details on 14 PS5 and PSVR 2 games. Scheduled for 3 PM PT, 6 PM ET, it'll be livestreamed across Sony's YouTube, Twitch, and TikTok channels. The PlayStation company added that the event will run for over 30 minutes.

State of Play returns with a 30+ minute broadcast this Thursday at 3pm PT / 11pm BST: https://t.co/eJWbP09sv3
Tune in live for updates on 14 PS5 and PS VR2 titles, including a look at PlayStation Studios titles arriving later this year. pic.twitter.com/B6Uc6aLWKF

— PlayStation (@PlayStation) May 29, 2024

This is the first Sony
title: PlayStation State Of Play Confirmed For This Week

description:
Recently, an interview with Naughty Dog's co-president (and The Last Of Us co-creator) Neil Druckmann made waves on social media, with some of Druckmann's apparent comments about AI (and other topics) drawing polarized reactions. Now, Sony has removed the interview entirely, stating that the company found "several significant errors and inaccuracies that don't represent his perspective and values."

The interview contained several statements that were circulated widely on social media, including one about AI "expanding creative possibilities" and another where Druckmann reportedly said that Naughty Dog's next project could "redefine mainstream perceptions of gaming." However, Druckmann later went to
title: Sony Pulls Neil Druckmann Interview, Citing "Significant Errors"

description:
Amazon Prime members can look forward to several new games in June, as old-school Star Wars action, weird cowboy capers, and a cosmic adventure with noir undertones are headlining the month. As usual, these seven titles will be released in waves, with each week bringing new games to add to your collection.

Kicking off the month is Star Wars: Battlefront 2, the multiplayer game set in the iconic galaxy. This is the classic edition of the 2005 game, which came with playable Jedi characters and 16 new locations at the time, including Star Wars: Episode 3 environments such as Utapau, Mustafar, and the dangerous airspace above Coruscant.

If you'd prefer high-noon action instead, Weird West is a pretty great game to grab in June. A dark fantasy-RPG, Weird West has lawmen and gunslingers taking on deadly supernatural creatures across harsh terrai
title: Amazon Prime Members Get 7 Free Games In June
Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Gets Big Price Cut For A Limited Time

description:
April's Top Games


It's that time again, as Circana has released its latest monthly report that offers insight into how the US video game industry is performing. The report includes April's best-selling games and financial figures and other data points regarding the industry's health and fortunes.

For April, the PS5 game Stellar Blade was the top-selling game of the month. It also rocketed up the charts to become the No. 16 best-selling game of 2024 overall after just one month.

Helldivers II, which remains 2024's best-selling game overall, was No. 2 in April, with Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, Sea of Thieves, and Fallout 4 rounding out the top five.

Sea of Thieves is notable because it surged from No. 55 in March to No. 4 in April,
title: Top 20 Best-Selling Games For April 2024 In The US

description:
Glen Powell is one of Hollywood's It Guys right now with many projects in the works, including co-creating a Captain Planet TV series that Leonardo DiCaprio is producing, and Netflix's Hitman arriving in June. That wasn't always the case for the actor and budding producer as he talked about his past roles that almost were.

Talking to GQ, Powell talked about how he missed out on almost landing Josh Hartnett’s role in Oppenheimer "by a slim margin," but it's the roles in big blockbuster franchises that he missed out on that he felt he blew the most: Captain America and Han Solo.

"I can joke about it now," the actor said, "[but] I blew that final audition." The role of Solo went to Alden Ehrenreich, and Captain America famously went to Chris Evans, who
title: Glen Powell Discusses How He Blew Both His Captain America And Han Solo Auditions

description:
Wine snobs will snort a glass of the stuff and go on a tangent about its taste, but what people really want to know is if a particular selection contains the rich flavor of Nier: Automata. Finally, for people of quality, you can down a bottle of wine enhanced with the audio power of Nier composer Keiichi Okabe's soundtrack. Sounds grape to us.

Onkyo Direct (via Rock Paper Shotgun) is selling two bottles of Nier: Automata wine, each loaded with
title: Buying Nier: Automata Wine Sounds Like A Pour Decision

description:
For the first time since 2014, EA is releasing a college football game--and people are pretty excited about. EA Sports College Football releases in July behind a mountain of hype and some notable changes.

First up, EA is no longer working with the NCAA, which is why the series has changed names. In another big step, the game features real player names and likenesses thanks to the Name, Image, Likeness, (NIL) program in college sports. Players are being paid for their appearance in the game.

While the NCAA is not involved in EA Sports College Football, EA has separately struck deals with the relevant rights-owners to secure 134 FBS schools, including their stadiums, fight songs, mascots, and thousands of players.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: EA Sports College Football 25: Release Date, Trailer, And Everything We Know

description: Kombat 1 on June 4 for early access players. Ferra joins the Kameo roster later in June. Play as Homelander on June 4
title: Mortal Kombat 1 – Official Homelander DLC Character Gameplay Reveal Trailer

description:
CD Projekt Red first announced that it was adapting Mike Pondsmith's Cyberpunk in 2012, and the game had a lengthy development cycle that culminated in Cyberpunk 2077 getting delayed to 2020. Because the game launched with numerous bugs, Sony delisted Cyberpunk 2077 from the PlayStation Store for over six months while CD Projekt Red addressed the issues. But now, for the first time in a decade, no one at CD Projekt Red is working on Cyberpunk 2077.

The announcement came as part of CD Projekt's latest earnings briefing, as CFO Piotr Nielubowicz released the company's updated financial results for the first quarter of 2024. Cyberpunk 2077's expansion, Phantom Liberty, was released last fall. Since then, one last major update for the game was released in December 2023.

On X, CD Projekt Red released a breakdown of its development team and its current projects. While Cyberpunk 2077 still had 17 developers at the end of February, it currently has none.
title: For The First Time In A Decade, No One Is Working On Cyberpunk 2077

description:
It sounds like the Forza Horizon series is going to be getting some new competition, and it's coming from a team of former Forza Horizon developers. Maverick Games, a new studio formed in 2022, has signed a publishing agreement with Amazon Games to create a new "narrative led open-world driving game," and unlike the Forza Horizon games, this one will also be available on PS5.

Maverick Games studio head and creative director Mike Brown previously served as creative director on Forza Horizon 5. It sounds like the developers will be building on that strong open-world-racing foundation for its new project, but with an increased emphasis on characters and story. Those are present in the Horizon games, but not necessarily a huge focus.
title: Former Forza Horizon Devs And Amazon Are Making A Story-Focused Open-World Racer

description: We got invited to watch a live demo of Destiny 2 The Final Shape, seeing the brand new gameplay of the new location The Pale Heart of the Traveler, the new strike, and the new Prismatic subclass.
title: We Saw A Destiny 2 The Final Shape. Here's What We Learned.

description:
Who would win in a fight, Superman or Homelander from The Boys? People want to know, and Antony Starr--who plays Homelander on the Prime Video series--has now weighed in with this thoughts.

Speaking to ScreenRant, Starr said Homelander would "kick Superman's ass" in part because he would not play by the rules. Superman is known for being honorable, but Homelander is a terrible, terrible person who has committed numerous atrocities and done unspeakable acts throughout The Boys. Starr said Homelander would lean into this to take down Superman.

"There's no Kryptonite factor, and Homie would fight so dirty. He's the [type to go], 'Oh, you got me!' as he goes down and then comes up and throws sand in your eyes. He's the dirty dude, man. Whereas Superman is always like, 'Oh, I wouldn't do that. Oh, there's innocent children that might get hurt.' Homie's going to
title: Superman Vs. Homelander: Who Would Win In A Fight? Antony Starr Weighs In

description:
Modern gamers who have fully embraced digital gaming may believe that the titles they've purchased will belong to them in perpetuity. But if anyone is hoping to pass on their Steam backlog to their next of kin, it turns out that Valve doesn't allow the rights to be transferred. In other words, your Steam library dies with you.

Via Ars Technica, a user on ResetEra posted a reply that they received from Steam support regarding their question about passing on their Steam library through a will. "Unfortunately, Steam accounts and games are non-transferable," replied a representative from Valve. "Steam Support can't provide someone else with access to the account or merge its contents with anoth
title: Your Steam Library Dies With You

description: RPG fans who haven't picked up Star Ocean: The Second Story R are in luck. The beautiful reimagining of the classic 1998 role-playing game is on sale for an awesome price. The remake gives the beloved entry in the series a modern touch; it's an adventure that deftly bridges the gap between past and future. The Second Story R has only received a couple discounts since launching last holiday, and the current $35 price matches the all-time low--which sold out quickly at this price last time. This deal is available for Nintendo Switch, PS5, and PS4 versions of the game at Amazon and
title: Star Ocean: The Second Story R Discounted To Best Price Yet At Amazon
